goal: The client will receive assistance in all areas of living as needed, while maintaining dignity at all times.
Each client will be assessed and cared for, based upon their individual wants and needs.
We will provide opportunities for seniors in nursing homes and discharging from hospitals to safely return to the their home and community.
We will provide home care services and training sufficient to ensure the client and their caregiver the assumption of personal responsibility for health and personal needs.
We will develop and maintain strong culture of employee satisfaction; an environment where employees feel appreciated and valued.
To provide educational opportunities within the health care system for employees through an ongoing participation in Home Care organizations.
